pageProduct.name: Redwin Hyaluronic Hydration Moisturiser 220g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Instantly moisturises and hydrates, improving the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for smoother, younger looking skin.

Hydrated skin is the secret to slowing down ageing. That's why Redwin's Hyaluronic Acid has been formulated to hold up to 1,000 times more water than its molecular weight. It binds water to skin cells for ultra hydrated skin and to improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Suitable For: Sensitive skin

Size: 220g

Warnings

Warning: Keep away from eyes

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water, Paraffinum Liquidum, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Dimethicone, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Myristyl Myristate, Stearic Acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Carbomer, Chlorphenesin, Beeswax, Myristyl Laurate, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Squalane, BHT, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ascorbyl Palmitate

Contains: N/A

Allergen Contains: Null

Allergen May Be Present: Null

Allergen Free From: n/a

Directions

Directions: Apply daily to face, neck, legs, all over body

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C
